data.title: 6 Best Soft Cheeses in Portugal
data.meta_description: List includes: Requeijão Serra da Estrela, Requeijão da Beira Baixa, Omorro Amanteigado, Travia da Beira Baixa, Zimbro.
data.text: TasteAtlas food rankings are based on the ratings of the TasteAtlas audience, with a series of mechanisms that recognize real users and that ignore bot, nationalist or local patriotic ratings, and give additional value to the ratings of users that the system recognizes as knowledgeable. TasteAtlas Rankings should not be seen as the final global conclusion about food. Their purpose is to promote excellent local foods, instill pride in traditional dishes, and arouse curiosity about dishes you haven’t tried.
